attributes.action: re-address the rise in unemplyed be able to sit at home and blag the system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am getting more and more about the amount of tax we are paying and seeing the unemployed not working claiming massive benefits and being able to afford luxury items out of my range.  If we are paying these people we are not getting nothing in return - GET THEM OUT making our community a better place to live by regenerating play areas, cleaning up the streets and get value for money.
